name: Mount Hunger

trails_config.name: Waterbury Trail
trails_config.description: A steep workout rewarding hikers with one of the best 360-degree panoramas in central Vermont.
trails_config.parking_info: Mount Hunger Trailhead, Sweet Rd, Waterbury Center, VT

current_conditions.ai_summary: Experience the beauty of Vermont on Mount Hunger. At 3539 feet, this summit commands impressive views of the surrounding wilderness.
risk_factors: Check local trail conditions before departing.
Start early to avoid afternoon storms.

generated_description:
The Experience

Standing at 3539 feet, Mount Hunger is a standout peak in Vermont. Known for its rugged and challenging terrain, it offers a quintessential hiking experience.

The Challenge

Hikers often choose the **Waterbury Trail**, a **3.6 mile** route gaining significant elevation. As part of the **local peak challenge**, it draws peak-baggers from across the region.

Peak Bagging Logic

**Peak Bagging Opportunity:** Consider connecting this hike with **Stowe Pinnacle**, which is just 2.8 miles away. Linking these peaks is a popular way to maximize your day on the trail.
